entry.title: [15 Packs] "Dry&Dry" Premium Cobalt Free Humidity Indicator Cards(6 Spots)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Other Packing & Shipping
Price: 5.99

[15 Packs] Dry & Dry Premium Cobalt Free Humidity Indicator Cards(6 Spots)

  • Card Dimension : 1.5"(3.8cm) x 4.5"(11.5cm)
  • Cobalt Chloride Free Premium Quality - Eco Friendly Humidity Indicator Card
  • 6 Spots Humidity Indicating - (10%/20%/30%/40%/50%/60% RH) - Clear Color Change
  • Indicator Changes Green to Purple(Violet) - Green(Dry) to Purple(Humid)
  • Major Electronics Companies use this cards

DRY & DRY - OUR PRODUCTS

  • Dry & Dry Humidity Indicator Card is Cobalt Chloride Free. 
  • It is strictly tested for clear color change 
  • It is Eco Friendly. 


DRY & DRY - PREMIUM QUALITY

  • Our Humidity Indicator Card is the highest quality in the industry for Humidity Measurement. 
  • It is strictly tested for clear color change in each Humidity Level(10%-60%) 
  • You can experience the difference with other products. 
  • Products of Dry&Dry guarantee 100% satisfaction. NO RISK 
  • If you have any problems about our products, we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

entry.title: Dry & Dry Premium Humidity Indicator Cards 250 Pack - 10-60% 6 Spot(250 Cards)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 49.99

You are now bidding on Brand New 250 Pack of Humidity Indicator Cards - 10-60% 6 Spot(250 Cards)

.

  • Color Changing Humidity Indicator Cards
  • (250 Pack) Premium Humidity Indicator Cards(REUSABLE More than 20 Times)
  • 6 Dot(10%,20%,30%,40%,50%,60%)
  • As the humidity increases the chemically impregnated spots change from a blue color (DRY) to a Pink Color(HUMID).
  • Do not have in Direct Contact with Foods or Medications to be Consumed.
  • When you initially open the card, all dots sometimes react and change color because they are exposed to sudden humidity. If you wait for about 30 minutes, the card will calibrate and you will be able to read the humidity level. If 10% dot is pink and 30% dot is blue, and 20% dot is lavender, then the humidity level is about 15%. If the 30% dot is pink, it is time to change the desiccant. The humidity card itself is reusable. When the humidity level is low, the dots will change from pink to blue again. With long use, the color of the dots may faint. Then, you can replace the card. 

 

Free Shipping

 

 

 

   Customer Service: 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!


We highly value our customers and if you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please return it for a refund or an exchange.
we will do everything we can to ensure that your every experience with us will be a positive one. 
   Payment


We accept only Paypal and we accept all major credit cards through PayPal checkout. 

Sorry, no personal checks and/or other payment methods. Buyers must claim and pay for their items within 7 days of auction close. 
   Shipping


FAST SHIPPING USING USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL WITHIN 24 HOUR OF PAYMENT 

We ship to all 50 U.S states and APO/FPO addresses. 

No international shipping 

All shipping options include delivery confirmation. 

Only ship to Paypal address (No exception). Please confirm before check out. 
We are always happy to combine shipping. Please request an Invoice before making payment..

*Term of Conditions: Buyer will be responsible for the shipping charge and tax (if applicable). 
   Tax


California Residents add 8.00 % sales tax. 
   Return


Defective items will be fully refunded or exchanged with new one. (no shipping or insurance refund) 

If you don't want the item anymore, You have 7 days from receipt to inform us of the return and 5 days to ship it back to us. No restocking fee! (Non Defective items: must be new never used and in original condition)

entry.title: "Dry & Dry" Premium Humidity Indicator Cards - 10-60% 6 Spot
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dry & Dry
Type: Desiccant, Moisture Absorber
Price: 7.99 - 44.99 (4 variants)

Humidity Indicator Cards - 10-60% 6 Spot

.

  • Color Changing Humidity Indicator Cards
  • (20 Pack) Premium Humidity Indicator Cards(REUSABLE More than 20 Times)
  • 6 Dot(10%,20%,30%,40%,50%,60%)
  • As the humidity increases the chemically impregnated spots change from a blue color (DRY) to a Pink color (HUMID).
  • Do not have in Direct Contact with Foods or Medications to be Consumed.
  • When you initially open the card, all dots sometimes react and change color because they are exposed to sudden humidity. If you wait for about 30 minutes, the card will calibrate and you will be able to read the humidity level. If 10% dot is pink and 30% dot is blue, and 20% dot is lavender, then the humidity level is about 15%. If the 30% dot is pink, it is time to change the desiccant. The humidity card itself is reusable. When the humidity level is low, the dots will change from pink to blue again. With long use, the color of the dots may faint. Then, you can replace the card.
